benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/emails - Add account email

covered: Valid Payload: creation with 201 and response includes new AccountEmail object
Invalid Payload: malformed JSON, missing fields, invalid email, extra fields
Large Payload: test for maximum payload (TC16)
Authorization and authentication: missing/invalid headers (TC13) and unauthorized access (TC14)
Path validation: invalid accountId format (TC07) and missing accountId (TC08)
Validation feedback: missing required fields, invalid email format (TC11, TC12)
Error/edge cases: SQL injection (TC23) and XSS (TC24)
Recovery and resilience: transient failures (TC25) and slow DB (TC19)
gaps: Duplicate submission / idempotency tests are missing
Caching behavior for POST (ETag/Cache-Control) not tested
More explicit authorization boundary tests (e.g., separate 401 vs 403) could be clarified
recommendations: Add a dedicated 500 Internal Server Error test for DB/service failures
Add idempotency tests for duplicate submissions
Add caching tests for POST responses
Clarify/authenticate boundary with distinct 401 vs 403 tests or separate scenario descriptions
Extend tests to validate error payload content/messages
